name: Generous
description: Generous (e.g. generous tipper, always helps out a person in need, philanthropist).

name: Animal Lover
description: Good with animals (e.g. loves cats, grew up on a farm, good with horses).

name: Dreamer
description: Dreamer (e.g. given to flights of fancy, visionary, highly creative).

name: Hedonist
description: Hedonist (e.g. life and soul of the party, entertaining drunk, "live fast and die young").

name: Risk-taker
description: Gambler and a risk-taker (e.g. poker-faced, try anything once, lives on the edge).

name: Good Cook
description: Good cook (e.g. bakes wonderful cakes, can make a meal from almost nothing, refined palate).

name: Charming
description: Ladies' man/seductress (e.g. suave, charming voice, enchanting eyes).

name: Loyal
description: Loyal (e.g. stands by his or her friends, never breaks a promise, would die for his or her beliefs).

name: Reputable
description: A good reputation (e.g. the best after-dinner speaker in the country, the most pious of men, fearless in the face of danger).

name: Ambitious
description: Ambitious (e.g. to achieve a goal, to become the boss, to have it all).
